title: Ferrari Opens Higher in Trading Debut
text:
Ferrari NV shares opened higher Wednesday on their first day of trading after the Italian luxury sports car makerâ€™s stock priced at the top of a previously announced range.
The stock opened at $60 and was recently up 11% to $57.92 in early trading. The shares priced at $52 a share in the IPO that raised $893 million for parent company Fiat... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
